channel.title: cider on Our Recipies
channel.description: Recent content in cider on Our Recipies

item.title: Cider Pie
item.description: Ingredients 5-6 medium sized granny smith apples 4 tbsp cinnamon 1 cup cider syrup 1/2 cup sugar 1/2 cub maple syrup 8 tbsp butter 1 tbsp vanilla 4 eggs 1 pie crust Directions Solid fillings Peel apples, and cut into small pieces. In a large pan, saute apples with 4 tbsp butter and connamon until soft Set aside once done. Liquid fillings In a medium sauce pan, combine 1/2 cup sugar, 1/2 cup maple syrup, 1 cup cider syrup, and 4 tbsp butter.

item.title: Cider Syrum
item.description: Ingredients 1 gallon of apple cider Directions Place cider into large, flatbottomed pot Bring cider to a boil Reduce heat to a simmer. Let simmer until volume has reduced to 2 1/3 cup. Make sure to scrape the sides of the pot while reducing Syrup will become much more viscous as it reduces. Target viscosity will leave a notable trail in the pot when the bottom is wiped with a spatula.

item.title: Cider Jammy Dodgers
item.description: Ingredients 8 ounces (227 grams) butter unsalted, softened 2/3 cup (64 grams) granulated sugar 2 large eggs, room temperature 1 teaspoon vanilla extract 2 1/4 cups (330 grams) all-purpose flour 1/4 teaspoon salt 1/2 cup (64 grams) cider syrup Directions Combine butter, sugar and eggs. Add the butter (227g) and sugar (64g) to a stand mixer or mixing bowl. Beat until light and fluffy. Add the eggs and continue to mix.
